entities.description: The Beauxbatons caravan is mentioned as likely to be chilly too.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper and is keeping Madame Maxime's horses well provided with their preferred drink of single-malt whiskey.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime's horses are being kept by Hagrid.

entities.name: skrewts
entities.description: The skrewts are described as horrible creatures that the class is tending in the pumpkin patch.

entities.name: pumpkin patch
entities.description: The pumpkin patch is where the class is tending the skrewts.

The class is tending the skrewts in the pumpkin patch.
